ARABIC: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا مُوسَى ٱلْكِتَٰبَ فَلَا تَكُن فِى مِرْيَةٍ مِّن لِّقَآئِهِۦ وَجَعَلْنَٰهُ هُدًى لِّبَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave Musa the Book - be in no doubt about the meeting with him - and made it a guidance for the tribe of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily We gave Moses the Book; so be not in doubt about his having received it; and We made it a guidance for the children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily We bestowed the Book upon Moses. So entertain no doubt if (the Prophet Muhammad) received the same. We had made that Book a guidance for the Children of Israel,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We gave the Book to Moses - do not have any doubt about the Day of Judgment - and made it a guide for the children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We bestowed the Book to Moosa, therefore have no doubt in its acquisition, and made it a guidance for the Descendants of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed We gave Musa the Scripture. So, be not you in doubt of meeting him. And We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly We gave the Book to Musa, so be not in doubt concerning the receiving of it, and We made it a guide for the children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed, We gave Moses the Book; so he not in doubt concerning the encounter with him; and We appointed it for a guidance to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We verily gave Moses the Scripture; so be not ye in doubt of his receiving it; and We appointed it a guidance for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We gave Moses the Scripture, so [Muhammad] do not doubt that you are receiving it, just as We made it a guide for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly We vouchsafed the Book Unto Musa; so be thou not in doubt in thy receiving it. And We appointed it to be a guidance unto the Children of Is'rail.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly We gave Moses the Book, [declaring], ‘Do not be in doubt about the encounter with Him,’ and We made it a [source of] guidance for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We did indeed aforetime give the Book to Moses: be not then in doubt of its reaching (thee): and We made it a guide to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed We gave Musa (Moses) the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)]. So be not you in doubt of meeting him [i.e. when you met Musa (Moses) during the night of Al-Isra' and Al-Mi'raj over the heavens]. And We made it [the Taurat (Torah)] a guide to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We have given the Book to Moses, so (Prophet Muhammad) do not be in doubt concerning the meeting with him (Prophet Moses) and made it a guidance to the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We gave Moses the Book; so do not be in doubt regarding His encounter; and We made it a guidance for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And We certainly gave Moses the Scripture, so do not be in doubt over his meeting. And we made the Torah guidance for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [32:23] And verily We gave Moses the Scripture, the Torah; so do not be in doubt concerning the encounter with Him, and indeed he and He met on the Night of the Journey; and We appointed him, namely, Moses — or [read ‘We appointed it’] the Scripture, a guidance for the Children of Israel.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We verily gave Moses the Scripture) the Torah in one bulk; (so be not ye) Muhammad (in doubt of his receiving it) of meeting Moses the night you were transported to Jerusalem; (and We appointed it) the Scripture of Moses (a guidance for the Children of Israel) from guidance.
